html: To this day, no federal health study has ever been conducted to examine the role mountaintop removal mining plays in public health & wellness. The Obama admin. called for an investigation. A review was halfway complete when Trump stopped it. The public deserves answers.pic.twitter.com/oBBNvF7NZc
text:
To this day, no federal health study has ever been conducted to examine the role mountaintop removal mining plays in public health & wellness.
 
The Obama admin. called for an investigation. A review was halfway complete when Trump stopped it.
 
The public deserves answers.pic.twitter.com/oBBNvF7NZc

html: The #TrumpBudget: -Cuts $12B from HHS discretionary budget -Cuts $4.5B from NIH -Cuts $1.4T from mandatory health spending, incl Medicare and Medicaid -Dismantles the ACA This is a budget that jeopardizes the health care security of millions of Americans and their families.pic.twitter.com/Va4IZyRNvI
text:
The #TrumpBudget:
-Cuts $12B from HHS discretionary budget
-Cuts $4.5B from NIH
-Cuts $1.4T from mandatory health spending, incl Medicare and Medicaid
-Dismantles the ACA
 
This is a budget that jeopardizes the health care security of millions of Americans and their families.pic.twitter.com/Va4IZyRNvI

html: Speaker Ryan told us the GOP tax bill would help companies like Harley-Davidson hire more workers. So what’d the company do once it became law? Bought back $700M in stocks, fired 800 workers, & opened a plant...in Thailand. This is the #GOPTaxScam at work.pic.twitter.com/iYojTxr4aw
